title: Amazing Spider-Man 500 Covers (Hardcover)
description: "This deluxe hardcover volume celebrates more than four decades and a landmark 500 issues of AMAZING SPIDER-MAN by collecting every cover to every issue of the series … ever! Featuring stunning artwork by comics’ greatest illustrators from the '60s through today -- including Steve Ditko, John Romita Jr. and Sr., John Buscema, Todd McFarlane, and J. Scott Campbell -- this volume also chronicles the highs and lows of Spider-Man’s spectacular career, as well as the ebb and flow of popular culture, over each of these 40-plus historical years!"
